snippet: Jewish and Muslim groups from across Europe on Thursday called on Germany to protect the right to circumcise boys after a Cologne court ruled that the practice amounts to bodily harm.
abstract: Jewish and Muslim groups across Europe call on Germany to protect the right to circumcise boys after a Cologne court ruled that the practice amounts to bodily harm; court decision applies only to the Cologne court’s jurisdiction, but it has created legal uncertainty.
lead_paragraph: Jewish and Muslim groups from across Europe on Thursday called on Germany to protect the right to circumcise boys after a Cologne court ruled that the practice amounts to bodily harm.
